title: Pamphlet Supplement
title-note: US compiled statutes and/or US code
aka: United States Code Annotated: Pamphlet Supplement

first-renewed-issue.note: United States Code Pamphlet Supplement Unannotated

renewed-issues.note: United States Code Pamphlet Supplement Unannotated

additional-note: The exact title varied somewhat by issue.  Issues of this serial were typically renewed as books, but sometimes were renewed as periodicals. Some issues covered the Statues and Code separately, some together. Pamphlet numbering may have reset periodically.
